headline: Comcast’s Sky In Talks to Buy ITV Broadcasting Unit in $2.1 Billion Deal
summary: A deal would bulk up Comcast’s footprint in Europe, where it already owns pay-TV operator Sky, and leave British broadcaster ITV focused on its studios operations.

content.title: Comcast’s Sky In Talks to Buy ITV Broadcasting Unit in $2.1 Billion Deal
content.summary: A deal would bulk up Comcast’s footprint in Europe, where it already owns pay-TV operator Sky, and leave British broadcaster ITV focused on its studios operations.

headline: Labubu, Opendoor, Airbnb, Nvidia: What's trending in markets
summary: Shares of Pop Mart (9992.HK), the Chinese toy maker behind the Labubu dolls, are down sharply after an exchange between employees commenting on the toys' price goes viral. Opendoor (OPEN) stock nosedives after the new CEO presents his turnaround strategy. Airbnb (ABNB) rallies as Goldman Sachs (GS) raises its price target for the stock. UK's ITV (ITV.L) soars on hopes of a potential deal with Comcast (CMCSA)'s Sky. As AI chip stocks including Nvidia (NVDA) and AMD slide, Qualcomm (QCOM)'s CEO strikes an optimistic note. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

content.title: Labubu, Opendoor, Airbnb, Nvidia: What's trending in markets
content.description:
Shares of Pop Mart (9992.HK), the Chinese toy maker behind the Labubu dolls, are down sharply after an exchange between employees commenting on the toys' price goes viral. Opendoor (OPEN) stock nosedives after the new CEO presents his turnaround strategy. Airbnb (ABNB) rallies as Goldman Sachs (GS) raises its price target for the stock. UK's ITV (ITV.L) soars on hopes of a potential deal with Comcast (CMCSA)'s Sky. As AI chip stocks including Nvidia (NVDA) and AMD slide, Qualcomm (QCOM)'s CEO strikes an optimistic note.

For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.
